title: Weather Manipulation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/5/21
itunes:title: Weather Manipulation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/5/21
description:
George Noory and author Dane Wigington explore his research into scientific efforts to control the weather, if the recent massive winter storms in Texas and Colorado were artificially created, and whether there is any way for the Earth to heal the ozone layer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:summary: A discussion on the latest efforts to slow climate change, with possibly disastrous results.
